np_to_tensor[source]

np_to_tensor(x:NDArray[Any, Ellipsis), Number], tensor_type:str)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Convert a numpy ndarray into a tensor. If tensor_type is 'image', put channel first.

load_batches[source]

load_batches(folder:Path, bs:int=16, device:str='cpu', filt:Optional[Callable[Path, bool]]=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Generator function that loads images from folder in batches of size bs on device.
